name: Cave Savers
description:
CAVE SAVERS OVERVIEW
Welcome to Cave Savers, the exploration 2-D Platformer! Humans from the overworld have gotten lost in the mysterious and creepy dark caves. As the rescue miner, navigate through the cave and save the lost survivors!

CONTROLS

Move Left/Right: A/D or Left Arrow/Right Arrow

Jump : W, Up Arrow, or Spacebar

Attack: F or ENTER

Interact: E

Pause: ESCAPE
